title: The Weakest Adventurer Becomes The Strongest In The World Thanks To "perfect Loot Rolls"
alternative_title: 最弱冒険者が【完全ドロップ】で現代最強 自分だけのレアスキルとカスタムアビリティを駆使して他の誰より強くなる! ; Saijaku Boukensha ga "Kanzen Drop" de Gendai Saikyou: Jibun dake no Rare Skill to Custom Ability Kushishite Hokano Dare yori Tsuyokunaru!
status: 最弱冒険者が【完全ドロップ】で現代最強 自分だけのレアスキルとカスタムアビリティを駆使して他の誰より強くなる! ; Saijaku Boukensha ga "Kanzen Drop" de Gendai Saikyou: Jibun dake no Rare Skill to Custom Ability Kushishite Hokano Dare yori Tsuyokunaru!
description:
Description :
        A mysterious dungeon has appeared in this modern era?! Adventurers challenge this dungeon in the pursuit of their dreams of getting rich quickly. From the weakest to the strongest! Aiming for the top by levelling up! The more you fight, the stronger you become in this battle saga!
